mapper.insert: INSERT INTO free(freeno, freetitle, freecontent, freename, freedate, freecnt, freelike, memberno) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(freeno), 0)+1 as freeno FROM free), #{freetitle}, #{freecontent}, #{freename}, sysdate, 0, 0, #{memberno})
